# nirvana_networking_firewall_rule (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nirvana_networking_firewall_rule" "example_networking_firewall_rule" {
  vpc_id = "vpc_id"
  firewall_rule_id = "firewall_rule_id"
}
```

Available values: "tcp", "udp".
